name: LongCovidDiagnosisSCT
title: Long Covid Diagnosis SCT
description: "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains SNOMED CT diagnosis terms representing Post Acute Sequelae of Sars-Cov-2 infection (PASC) (Long Covid) disease.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a diagnosis of long covid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes the SNOMED CT long covid diagnosis concept. Currently only a single member value set, but defined intentionally so if children codes are developed they will be included.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include the specific condition related to the diagnosis of Long covid-19 (for example, pulmonary fibrosis).)
